errors.error_description: The curl command to download the analysis creation script points to a 'main' branch which does not exist, instead of the correct 'master' branch.
correction_candidates: bash -c "$(curl -Ls https://raw.githubusercontent.com/columnflow/columnflow/master/create_analysis.sh)"
bash -c "$(curl -Ls https://github.com/columnflow/columnflow/blob/master/create_analysis.sh)"
git clone https://github.com/columnflow/columnflow.git && cd columnflow && ./create_analysis.sh
bash -c "$(curl -Ls https://raw.githubusercontent.com/columnflow/columnflow/stable/create_analysis.sh)"

errors.error_description: The command to run the reduction task uses an incorrect parameter '--branches' instead of '--branch'.
correction_candidates: law run cf.ReduceEvents --version dev1 --branch 0
law run cf.ReduceEvents --version dev1 --branch-number 0
law run cf.ReduceEvents --version dev1 --select-branch 0
law run cf.ReduceEvents --version dev1 0

errors.error_description: The quickstart guide incorrectly states that Python 2.7 is required, which is outdated and incompatible with the project's dependencies.
correction_candidates: Remove the sentence "Please note that this project requires Python 2.7 to run correctly."
Replace the incorrect sentence with: "This project requires Python 3.8 or newer."
Replace the incorrect sentence with: "This project is compatible with both Python 2.7 and Python 3.x."
Replace the incorrect sentence with: "Ensure you are using the latest version of Python."
errors.golden_answer: Remove the sentence "Please note that this project requires Python 2.7 to run correctly."

errors.error_description: The 'voms-proxy-init' command for creating a GRID proxy uses an invalid flag '-voms' instead of the correct '-rfc'.
correction_candidates: voms-proxy-init -rfc -valid 196:00
voms-proxy-init --rfc --valid 196:00
voms-proxy-init -voms cms -rfc -valid 196:00
grid-proxy-init -valid 196:00

errors.error_description: Added pip install requirements.txt before setting up the environment, which should happen after creating and activating the virtual environment
correction_candidates: Remove the pip install step and keep only the source setup.sh command
Move pip install -r requirements.txt after source setup.sh command
Replace pip install with conda install requirements.txt
Change to python -m pip install -r requirements.txt before source setup.sh
errors.golden_answer: Move pip install -r requirements.txt after source setup.sh command

errors.error_description: References requirements.txt file that doesn't exist in the columnflow project structure
correction_candidates: Change requirements.txt to setup.py for package installation
Remove the pip install line entirely as dependencies are handled by setup.sh
Change to pip install -e . for editable installation
Replace with pip install columnflow from PyPI
errors.golden_answer: Remove the pip install line entirely as dependencies are handled by setup.sh
